ValidationRule.description: Validates that a CRD only accepts numeric values.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK( agentsync__CRD__c )), OR( ISNEW(), AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED( agentsync__CRD__c ) ) ), !REGEX( agentsync__CRD__c ,'^[0-9]*$') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A valid CRD Number must be all digits. Please double check the entered number.
